'''''The Silent, Dreamless Paradise''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned by arriving at the entrance to the [[Eternal Oasis]], which occurs as the final step of ''[[Dune-Entombed Fecundity: Part III]]''.
